name: Fire and Dice
description:
Fire and Dice

Dice up the competition before you're slain.

Fire and Dice was made during GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Controls
  • Hold and drag a dice to move it
  • Press Attack to deal damage to the adventurers
Team
  • Golen, ArcticFqx (code)
  • Luxx, Konix, Lumie (art)
  • Matojeje, Kiu (audio)
  • Wilon (concept)

Soundtrack is available here!
